p: Three patients lived in different cities of Krasnoyarsk Krai including two women infected via HS and one PWID man with HIV diagnosed from May 2016 to May 2017. HIV-1 Krasnoyarsk 100, which is a product of recombination of three viruses (URFA/B/6302A1), was isolated from a woman infected via HS with HIV detected in 2017.
